Package com.platform.audit.internal

Interface AuditEventRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<AuditEvent,UUID>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<AuditEvent,UUID>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<AuditEvent,UUID>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<AuditEvent,UUID>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<AuditEvent,UUID>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<AuditEvent>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<AuditEvent,UUID>
@Repository public interface AuditEventRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<AuditEvent,UUID>

    • findByOrganizationIdAndCreatedAtBetween

      @Query("SELECT ae FROM AuditEvent ae WHERE ae.organizationId = :organizationId AND ae.createdAt BETWEEN :startDate AND :endDate ORDER BY ae.createdAt DESC") org.springframework.data.domain.Page<AuditEvent> findByOrganizationIdAndCreatedAtBetween(@Param("organizationId") UUID organizationId, @Param("startDate") Instant startDate, @Param("endDate") Instant endDate, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)

    • findByOrganizationIdAndActionAndCreatedAtBetween

      @Query("SELECT ae FROM AuditEvent ae WHERE ae.organizationId = :organizationId AND ae.action = :action AND ae.createdAt BETWEEN :startDate AND :endDate ORDER BY ae.createdAt DESC") org.springframework.data.domain.Page<AuditEvent> findByOrganizationIdAndActionAndCreatedAtBetween(@Param("organizationId") UUID organizationId, @Param("action") String action, @Param("startDate") Instant startDate, @Param("endDate") Instant endDate, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)

    • findByOrganizationIdAndResourceTypeAndResourceId

      @Query("SELECT ae FROM AuditEvent ae WHERE ae.organizationId = :organizationId AND ae.resourceType = :resourceType AND ae.resourceId = :resourceId ORDER BY ae.createdAt DESC") List<AuditEvent> findByOrganizationIdAndResourceTypeAndResourceId(@Param("organizationId") UUID organizationId, @Param("resourceType") String resourceType, @Param("resourceId") String resourceId)

    • findByOrganizationIdAndIpAddressAndCreatedAtBetween

      @Query("SELECT ae FROM AuditEvent ae WHERE ae.organizationId = :organizationId AND ae.ipAddress = :ipAddress AND ae.createdAt BETWEEN :startDate AND :endDate ORDER BY ae.createdAt DESC") List<AuditEvent> findByOrganizationIdAndIpAddressAndCreatedAtBetween(@Param("organizationId") UUID organizationId, @Param("ipAddress") String ipAddress, @Param("startDate") Instant startDate, @Param("endDate") Instant endDate)

    • countByOrganizationIdAndActionAndCreatedAtAfter

      @Query("SELECT COUNT(ae) FROM AuditEvent ae WHERE ae.organizationId = :organizationId AND ae.action = :action AND ae.createdAt >= :since") long countByOrganizationIdAndActionAndCreatedAtAfter(@Param("organizationId") UUID organizationId, @Param("action") String action, @Param("since") Instant since)

    • countByOrganizationIdAndActorIdAndCreatedAtAfter

      @Query("SELECT COUNT(ae) FROM AuditEvent ae WHERE ae.organizationId = :organizationId AND ae.actorId = :actorId AND ae.createdAt >= :since") long countByOrganizationIdAndActorIdAndCreatedAtAfter(@Param("organizationId") UUID organizationId, @Param("actorId") UUID actorId, @Param("since") Instant since)

    • findDistinctActionsByOrganizationId

      @Query("SELECT DISTINCT ae.action FROM AuditEvent ae WHERE ae.organizationId = :organizationId ORDER BY ae.action") List<String> findDistinctActionsByOrganizationId(@Param("organizationId") UUID organizationId)

    • findDistinctResourceTypesByOrganizationId

      @Query("SELECT DISTINCT ae.resourceType FROM AuditEvent ae WHERE ae.organizationId = :organizationId ORDER BY ae.resourceType") List<String> findDistinctResourceTypesByOrganizationId(@Param("organizationId") UUID organizationId)

    • deleteEventsOlderThan

      @Modifying @Query("DELETE FROM AuditEvent ae WHERE ae.createdAt < :cutoffDate") int deleteEventsOlderThan(@Param("cutoffDate") Instant cutoffDate)

    • deleteByOrganizationId

      @Modifying @Query("DELETE FROM AuditEvent ae WHERE ae.organizationId = :organizationId") int deleteByOrganizationId(@Param("organizationId") UUID organizationId)

    • deleteByActorId

      @Modifying @Query("DELETE FROM AuditEvent ae WHERE ae.actorId = :actorId") int deleteByActorId(@Param("actorId") UUID actorId)

    • redactUserData

      @Modifying @Query("UPDATE AuditEvent ae SET ae.details = :redactedData WHERE ae.actorId = :actorId") int redactUserData(@Param("actorId") UUID actorId, @Param("redactedData") String redactedData)

    • searchAuditEvents

      @Query("SELECT ae FROM AuditEvent ae WHERE ae.organizationId = :organizationId AND (ae.action LIKE %:searchTerm% OR ae.resourceType LIKE %:searchTerm% OR ae.correlationId LIKE %:searchTerm%) ORDER BY ae.createdAt DESC") org.springframework.data.domain.Page<AuditEvent> searchAuditEvents(@Param("organizationId") UUID organizationId, @Param("searchTerm") String searchTerm, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)

    • findSecurityEventsAfter

      @Query("SELECT ae FROM AuditEvent ae WHERE ae.organizationId = :organizationId AND ae.action IN (\'LOGIN_FAILED\', \'UNAUTHORIZED_ACCESS\', \'SUSPICIOUS_ACTIVITY\') AND ae.createdAt >= :since ORDER BY ae.createdAt DESC") List<AuditEvent> findSecurityEventsAfter(@Param("organizationId") UUID organizationId, @Param("since") Instant since)

    • findSuspiciousIpAddresses

      @Query("SELECT ae.ipAddress, COUNT(ae) as count FROM AuditEvent ae WHERE ae.organizationId = :organizationId AND ae.action = \'LOGIN_FAILED\' AND ae.createdAt >= :since GROUP BY ae.ipAddress HAVING COUNT(ae) > :threshold") List<Object[]> findSuspiciousIpAddresses(@Param("organizationId") UUID organizationId, @Param("since") Instant since, @Param("threshold") long threshold)
